traits.name: Fear Aura
entries: Any creature hostile to the pit fiend that starts its turn within 20 feet of the pit fiend must make a {@dc 21} Wisdom saving throw, unless the pit fiend is {@condition incapacitated}. On a failed save, the creature is {@condition frightened} until the start of its next turn. If a creature's saving throw is successful, the creature is immune to the pit fiend's Fear Aura for the next 24 hours.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The pit fiend has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

traits.name: Magic Weapons
entries: The pit fiend's weapon attacks are magical.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The pit fiend makes four attacks: one with its bite, one with its claw, one with its mace, and one with its tail.

actions.name: Bite
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 22 (4d6 + 8 damage) piercing damage. The target must succeed on a DC 21 Constitution saving throw or become {@condition poisoned}. While {@condition poisoned} in this way, the target can't regain hit points, and it takes 21 (6d6 damage) poison damage at the start of each of its turns. The {@condition poisoned} target can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 17 (2d8 + 8 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Mace
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d6 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage plus 21 (6d6 damage) fire damage.

actions.name: Tail
entries: Melee atk +14 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 24 (3d10 + 8 damage) bludgeoning damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
